title: Waist Belt
description: center 3-1/4\" black and green woven horizontal geometric strip brodered by red, yellow and black woven bands spaced by heavier vertical weft shot every 2\"; fifteen solid color tassels with silvered glass beads on each end in red, green, purple and tan
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
